CHAT.comment: SPRINT COMMUNICATIONS COMPANY, L.P., ET AL., Petitioners v. APCC SERVICES, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROY T. ENGLERT, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the hearing in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
